person.name: Octaviano Tenorio
person.description: Elder Octaviano Tenorio was called to serve as a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on March 31, 2007, at age 64. He served previously as an Area Seventy in the MÃ©xico South Area and as a member of the Fourth Quorum of the Seventy from April 1997 to April 2000. As an Area Seventy he served as a counselor in the Mexico South Area Presidency. Elder Tenorio is currently serving as a counselor in the Mexico Area Presidency.
